name: Number Wizard (Karbenstein)
description:
This is another tiny "game" I made by following the GameDev.tv Udemy course, "Learn to Code by Making Games - Complete C# Unity Developer". It's a great course, and I'd recommend it to anyone looking to learn C#.

This is a simple little thing where you think of a number, and the machine tries to guess it. If it doesn't get it in 10 tries, you win.

Really simple coding exercise, but I'm happy with it.
